column4: Tesla acquisition target SolarCity raises $345 million to fund projects
column5: SolarCity Corp   which received a takeover bid from Elon Musk's Tesla Motors in June  said it has raised $345 million in tax equity and also increased its debt facility by $110 million to $760 million.
